name: Cheesy Oven Roasted Fingerling Fries
author: Reynolds Kitchens(R)
summary: Every table deserves to try this finger-licking-good appetizer from Gaby Dalkin of What's Gaby Cooking.
ingredients: 3 pounds fingerling potatoes, cut in half lengthwise
Kosher salt and cracked black pepper to taste
directions: In a large bowl, toss together the halved potatoes, olive oil, butter, garlic salt and freshly cracked black pepper
Tear 4 large sheets of Reynolds Wrap® Aluminum Foil, each about 16 inches long
Divide the potato mixture evenly between the sheets of foil
Double fold top and ends to seal packet, leaving room for heat circulation inside
Place the packets on a baking sheet and transfer to the oven
Remove one packet from the oven
Open packet carefully by cutting along top fold with a sharp knife, allowing steam to escape; then open top of foil packet
Check to see if the potatoes are fully cooked and fork tender; if not, return to the oven for 5 more minutes
Once cooked, open up the packets and top each portion of potatoes with cheese and herbs
Let the cheese melt before serving
Season with salt and pepper to taste
